name: MacBook Pro
desc: The MacBook Pro delivers exceptional performance with the latest M-series chips, a brilliant Retina display, and up to 18 hours of battery life, perfect for professionals and creatives.

name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
desc: The iPhone 15 Pro Max features a stunning Super Retina XDR display, A17 Bionic chip, advanced camera system with 48MP main camera, and all-day battery life.

name: Apple Watch Series 9
desc: The Apple Watch Series 9 offers advanced health and fitness tracking, a brighter display, and new gesture controls, all in a sleek, water-resistant design.

name: iPad (10th Generation)
desc: The iPad (10th Generation) combines powerful performance with the A14 Bionic chip, a 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, and compatibility with the Apple Pencil, ideal for work and entertainment.

name: Beats Studio3 Wireless Headphones
desc: Beats Studio3 Wireless Headphones offer premium sound quality with noise cancellation, up to 22 hours of listening time, and a comfortable over-ear design.

name: AirPods Max
desc: AirPods Max deliver high-fidelity audio, Active Noise Cancellation, and a stunning design, offering an immersive listening experience with spatial audio support.

name: iPhone 14 Pro Max
desc: The iPhone 14 Pro Max features a Super Retina XDR display, the powerful A16 Bionic chip, Pro camera system with 48MP main camera, and advanced safety features.

name: iPad Air (5th Generation)
desc: The iPad Air (5th Generation) features the M1 chip, a 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, and supports the Magic Keyboard and Apple Pencil, making it a versatile tool for productivity and creativity.

name: AirPods Pro (2nd Generation)
desc: AirPods Pro (2nd Generation) feature Active Noise Cancellation, Transparency mode, improved sound quality, and a customizable fit for all-day comfort.

name: Xiaomi Smart Band 7
desc: Xiaomi Smart Band 7 offers comprehensive fitness tracking, a vibrant AMOLED display, and a lightweight design, providing up to 14 days of battery life.
